cause.description:
Fight For Green is a non-profit organization interested in protecting and promoting a healthy surrounding through raising awareness of the environment and performing acts of compassion such as planting trees, recycling, campaigning for people’s reduction of their carbon footprint, etc.
1. Recycle
2. Turn of Lights and Electronics when not needed
3. Use earthle.com instead of google.com it helps
cause.name: Fight For Green
